W19_LTXT_COMM_SWAMP01_INTRO_RIGHT_IVY_DE.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_SWAMP01_INTRO_RIGHT_IVY_DE.text: Vines stretch all the way up the cliff.

W19_LTXT_COMM_SWAMP01_INTRO_LEFT_CASCADE.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_SWAMP01_INTRO_LEFT_CASCADE.text: Water is pouring from the top of the cliff.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_05_TUTO_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_05_TUTO_DETAIL.text: There's a beaver in a lodge made from branches. Perhaps you could take one with you?

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_01_TUTO_DON.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_01_TUTO_DON.text: You should take the branch you found in the beaver's lodge to the eagle.

W19_EVAR_COMM_IVY_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_IVY_DETAIL.text: Vines stretch all the way up the cliff. You should be able to climb them.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CASCADE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CASCADE_DETAIL.text: Water is pouring from the top of the cliff. You should be able to ride the current down.

W19_EVAR_COMM_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.text: There's a dead tree here. If you could push it over, it would form a bridge to the next platform.

W19_LTXT_COMM_SWAMP_06_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_SWAMP_06_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.text: There's a dead tree here. If you could push it over, it would form a bridge to the next platform. Sadly, you're not sure how to go about that.

W19_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_02_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_02_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.text: There's a dead tree here. If you could push it over, it would form a bridge to the next platform. Sadly, you're not sure how to go about that.

W19_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_05_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_05_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.text: There's a dead tree here. If you could push it over, it would form a bridge to the next platform. Sadly, you're not sure how to go about that.

W19_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_07_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_FOREST_07_BRIDGE_UP_DETAIL.text: There's a dead tree here. If you could push it over, it would form a bridge to the next platform. Sadly, you're not sure how to go about that.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_3_DE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_3_DE.text: Water is pouring down the cliff. If you plant a seed and grow some vines, you can reach the top. You currently have three seeds left.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_2_DE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_2_DE.text: Water is pouring down the cliff. If you plant a seed and grow some vines, you can reach the top. You currently have two seeds left.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_1_DE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_1_DE.text: Water is pouring down the cliff. If you plant a seed and grow some vines, you can reach the top. You currently have one seed left.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_3_DE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_3_DE.text: Vines stretch down the cliff. If you have a bug eat them, it will create a waterfall you can ride to the bottom. You have three bugs remaining.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_2_DE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_2_DE.text: Vines stretch down the cliff. If you have a bug eat them, it will create a waterfall you can ride to the bottom. You have two bugs remaining.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_1_DE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_1_DE.text: Vines stretch down the cliff. If you have a bug eat them, it will create a waterfall you can ride to the bottom. You have one bug remaining.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_DETA.text: Water is pouring down the cliff. If you plant a seed and grow some vines, you can reach the top.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_DETA.text: Vines stretch down the cliff. If you have a bug eat them, it will create a waterfall you can ride to the bottom.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_NONE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_NONE.text: Water is pouring down the cliff. If you plant a seed and grow some vines, you can reach the top. Sadly, you have no seeds.

W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_NONE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_NONE.text: Vines stretch down the cliff. If you have a bug eat them, it will create a waterfall you can ride to the bottom. Sadly, you have no bugs.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_01_DETAIL.text: A group of frogs are croaking in the marsh, forming a chorus of sorts.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_02_DETAIL.text: Animal bones are scattered around the area. What could have happened here?

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_03_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_03_DETAIL.text: A snake is coiled in the grass. It's not going to attack you, is it?

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_04_DETAIL.text: There's a crocodile lurking in the marsh. It would be dangerous to get too close.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_05_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_05_DETAIL.text: A beaver has made a lodge of branches here.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_06_DETAIL.text: A dragonfly is soaring happily through the sky. The wind here feels good.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_01_DETAIL.text: A spider is crawling around. These fearsome creatures eat anything that comes too close.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_02_DETAIL.text: This burrow is like a cave. Could something be lurking inside?

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_DETAIL.text: Ants are gathering around their nest. Try not to step on them as you walk by!

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_DETAIL.text: Ants are crawling on the ground. Try not to step on them as you walk by!

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_05_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_05_DETAIL.text: Bees are flying around their hive. Probably best to keep your distance.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_NEST_06_DETAIL.text: There's a very large spiderweb between the branches here.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_01_DETAIL.text: There's a pack of wolves here. You wonder if it's a good idea to get any closer.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_02_DETAIL.text: The cavity in this tree forms a cave. Could something be lurking inside?

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_03_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_03_DETAIL.text: There's an insectivorous plant here. It's not going to attack you, is it?

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_DETAIL.text: This bird's nest is currently empty.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_DONE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_DONE_DETAIL.text: The eggs you rescued from the snake are now in the nest. The nest is littered with brown feathers, but where is the bird they came from?

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_DETA.text: This was once the nest of an owl, but it's since been destroyed by a cuckoo. The eggs within have been smashed.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_DONE.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_DONE.text: This was once the nest of an owl, but it's since been destroyed by a cuckoo. The eggs within have been smashed.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_DETAIL.text: It turns out this nest belongs to an owl. The owl has returned, and the eggs are unharmed.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_DONE_DE.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_DONE_DE.text: It turns out this nest belongs to an owl. The owl has returned, and the eggs are unharmed.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_05_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_05_DETAIL.text: A cuckoo is soaring through the sky. Perhaps it's on its way back to its nest.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_05_OWL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_05_OWL_DETAIL.text: A cuckoo is soaring through the sky. It looks bored.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_06_DETAIL.text: An owl is sitting in a tree. It looks troubled.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUCKOO_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUCKOO_DETA.text: An owl is sitting in a tree. It looks sad.

W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_07_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_07_DETAIL.text: The deer is looking at you as if it wishes to convey something.

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_OFF_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_OFF_DETA.text: This giant turtle has been turned to stone. Is there a way to bring it back to life?

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_OFF_DETAI.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_OFF_DETAI.text: This giant bat has been turned to stone. Is there a way to bring it back to life?

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_OFF_DET.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_OFF_DET.text: This giant squirrel has been turned to stone. Is there a way to bring it back to life?

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_OFF_DET.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_OFF_DET.text: This giant bear has been turned to stone. Is there a way to bring it back to life?

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_01_DETAIL.text: This giant eagle has a divine presence.

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_DETAIL.text: This giant turtle has a divine presence.

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_DETAIL.text: This giant bat has a divine presence.

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_DETAIL.text: This giant squirrel has a divine presence.

W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_LTXT_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_DETAIL.text: This giant bear has a divine presence.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_02_DETAIL.text: These look to be the bones of an animal. Perhaps you'll find something here.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_03_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_03_DETAIL.text: There's a snake coiled around eggs. It seems to be trying to protect them.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_04_DETAIL.text: This crocodile looks to be feeding. You wonder what it's eating.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_DETAIL.text: A swarm of ants is gathering around their nest. Perhaps the ant you have came from here?

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_DETAIL.text: An ant is crawling on the ground. It doesn't seem to be able to find its way back to its nest.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_06_DETAIL.text: Something is caught in the spiderweb.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_01_DETAIL.text: The wolves here have formed a pack. Their pups are playing with something.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_01_EARLY_DETAI.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_01_EARLY_DETAI.text: The wolves here have formed a pack. Their pups are playing with something.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_DETAIL.text: This is an empty bird's nest. Perhaps the youngsters within have already flown away?

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_TITLE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_TITLE.text: Returning the Eggs to the Nest

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_DETAIL.text: This is a bird's nest. Perhaps the eggs you obtained from the snake came from here? You should try putting them back.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_BUTTON.text: Return the Eggs to the Nest

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_DETA.text: There's a bird's nest with eggs inside. Perhaps it belongs to the cuckoo you have with you?

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_DETAIL.text: There's a bird's nest with eggs inside. Perhaps it belongs to the owl you have with you?

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_05_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_05_DETAIL.text: A cuckoo is soaring through the skies. Perhaps it's on its way back to its nest.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_06_DETAIL.text: An owl in sitting in a tree. It doesn't seem to be able to fly. Perhaps you should try to help?

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_DETAI.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_DETAI.text: The frog is letting out a cry. Looks like it's about to eat something.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_DETAI.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_DETAI.text: A beaver is hard at work making a lodge out of branches. It's so focused on its work, it has no time to pay attention to anything else.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_DETAI.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_DETAI.text: A dragonfly is flapping sadly through the sky. While quite large, it doesn't seem to have any interest in attacking you.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_END_D.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_END_D.text: A dragonfly is soaring through the sky. Perhaps you should release the one you caught here.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_02_ROUTE2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_02_ROUTE2_DETAIL.text: The giant insect's burrow is like a cave inside. It will take great courage to enter this place.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_02_ROUTE2_EARLY_.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_02_ROUTE2_EARLY_.text: The giant insect's burrow is like a cave inside. It will take great courage to enter this place.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_DETAIL.text: A swarm of ants is gathering around this nest. Perhaps whatever the squirrel was eating can be found inside.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_EARLY_.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_EARLY_.text: A swarm of ants is gathering around this nest. Something looks to be inside.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_DETAIL.text: You spy a swarm of ants on the move. They seem to be carrying something.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_EARLY_.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_EARLY_.text: You spy a swarm of ants on the move. They seem to be carrying something.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_DETAIL.text: Bees are flying around their hive, but you sense something else among them.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_DETA.text: The cavity within this tree forms a cave. It will take great courage to enter this place.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_EARL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_EARL.text: The cavity within this tree forms a cave. It will take great courage to enter this place.

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_DETA.text: There's an insectivorous plant here. It's currently dissolving its prey with digestive juices, but what did it manage to catch?

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_EARL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_EARL.text: There's an insectivorous plant here. It's currently dissolving its prey with digestive juices, but what did it manage to catch?

W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_DETA.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_DETA.text: The deer is brandishing its horns. Something seems to be stuck on them.

W19_EVAR_COMM_EAGLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_EAGLE_000_DETAIL.text: A large eagle is looking at you. It seems to be asking you to come over.

W19_EVAR_COMM_EAGLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_EAGLE_010_DETAIL.text: An eagle is looking at you with a mix of unease and expectation.

W19_EVAR_COMM_EAGLE_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_EAGLE_020_DETAIL.text: You should take the branch you found in the beaver's lodge to the eagle.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STONE_DE.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STONE_DE.text: This giant stone turtle has a cracked shell. You should take a closer look.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_DETAIL.text: Perhaps you can use your turtle shell fragment to bring the turtle back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE_DET.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE_DET.text: This giant stone bat seems to be missing its wings. You should take a closer look.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_DETAIL.text: Perhaps you can use your two bat wings to bring the bat back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STONE_D.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STONE_D.text: This giant stone squirrel looks like it was about to eat something when it was petrified. You should take a closer look.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_DETAIL.text: Perhaps you can use your walnut to bring the squirrel back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_EARLY_D.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_EARLY_D.text: Perhaps you can use your walnut to bring the squirrel back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_UNREACH.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_UNREACH.text: This giant stone squirrel looks like it was about to eat something when it was petrified. You should take a closer look.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STONE_D.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STONE_D.text: This giant bear has been turned to stone. It doesn't appear to have any teeth. You should try getting closer.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_DETAIL.text: Perhaps these teeth will let you bring the bear back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STONE_00.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STONE_00.text: This giant turtle has been turned to stone. You must repair its shell if you want to bring it back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STONE_00.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STONE_00.text: You Can't Do Anything Right Now

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE_001.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE_001.text: This giant bat has been turned to stone. You must recover both of its wings if you want to bring it back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE_001.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE_001.text: You Can't Do Anything Right Now

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STONE_0.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STONE_0.text: This giant squirrel has been turned to stone. You need some food if you want to bring it back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STONE_0.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STONE_0.text: You Can't Do Anything Right Now

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STONE_0.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STONE_0.text: This giant bear has been turned to stone. You'll need to recover its teeth if you want to bring it back to life.

W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STONE_0.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STONE_0.text: You Can't Do Anything Right Now

W19_EVAR_COMM_GAMEEND_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_COMM_GAMEEND_000_DETAIL.text: You've brought all the petrified animals back to life. There's nothing more for you to do here.
